abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column notes that NCAA men’s basketball tournament championship game between Villanova and North Carolina in Houston will be broadcast for first time by cable television channel TBS.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament championship game between Villanova and North Carolina in Houston will be broadcast on TBS.

headline.main: TBS Acquires N.C.A.A. Final and Fewer Eyeballs
headline.print_headline: For Its First Final, TBS Plays Down Ratings

snippet: The N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament championship game between Villanova and North Carolina in Houston will be broadcast on TBS.
